21269.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Oh. <pc>. You've come a long
way. We found Lunana's footsteps.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21269.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「おお……。<pc>か……。
　よく…来てくれたな……。
　ルナナの足取りが……　つかめたのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21269.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 오오……. <pc>인가…….
　잘… 왔네…….
　루나나의 소재를…… 알아냈다네…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21269.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>哦……<pc>，是你啊……
你来得……正是时候……
我已经掌握……露娜娜的行踪了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21269.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>喔……<pc>，是你啊……
你來得……正是時候……
我已經掌握……露娜娜的行蹤了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21270.en:
Lunana followed the Magical Beast Byblos from Raniakka to the southwest through the Zagban Hills to the Cave
of Zaag in the far south.
21270.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「ルナナは　魔獣ビュブロスを…追って……
　このラニアッカから　南西のザグバン丘陵に抜け
　南の果てにある　ザアグの洞門に向かった……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21270.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 루나나는 마수 비블로스를… 쫓아……
　라니악카 남서쪽의 자그반 구릉을 지나
　남쪽 끝에 있는 자아그 동문으로 향했네…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21270.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>露娜娜追着……魔兽朱拜勒斯……
通过拉尼阿卡西南方的扎古巴恩丘陵，
往最南端的扎阿古洞门去了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21270.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>露娜娜追著……魔獸朱拜勒斯……
越過拉尼亞卡西南方的札格邦丘陵，
往最南端的札古洞門去了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21271.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>The Cave of Zaag is the place where I
once defeated Leon Byblo, and where
Holta died!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21271.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「じつはな……　その　ザアグの洞門こそ
　わしが　かつて　レオン・ビュブロを討ち……
　ホルタが果てた　因縁の地なのだ……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21271.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 실은…… 그 자아그 동문이
　내가 지난날 레옹 비블로를 무찌르고……
　홀터가 세상을 떠난 곳이라네……!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21271.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>其实……扎阿古洞门正是
我杀死里昂·朱拜勒……
也是霍尔达死去的地方……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21271.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>其實……札古洞門正是
我殺死里昂‧朱拜勒……
也是霍爾達死去的地方……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21272.en:
I have a bad feeling about this. Why is Magical Beast Byblos, the son of Leon Byblo, heading to that fateful
place?
21272.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「なにやら　いやな予感がする……。
　レオン・ビュブロの子である　魔獣ビュブロスが
　なぜ　その因縁の地に　向かっているのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21272.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 불길한 예감이 드는군…….
　레옹 비블로의 자식인 마수 비블로스가
　왜 하필 그 땅으로 향했는지…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21272.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>不知道为什么，我有种不好的预感……
里昂·朱拜勒之子，魔兽朱拜勒斯
为什么要到那个因缘之地去呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21272.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>不知道為什麼，我有種不好的預感……
里昂‧朱拜勒之子，魔獸朱拜勒斯
為什麼要到那個因緣之地去呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21273.en:
The time has come. Will you not lead me to the land of the dead? And protect Lunana from the fangs of the
beast.
21273.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ……　時は来た。
　わしを……　かの地まで　導いてくれぬか？
　そして　ルナナを　魔獣の牙から守るのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21273.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: <pc>…… 때가 되었네.
　날…… 그곳으로 데려가 주지 않겠나?
　그리고 루나나를 마수로부터 지키는 걸세…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21273.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>啊……是时候了。
你能……带我到那里去吗……？
我们一定要击败那头魔兽，保护露娜娜……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21273.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>啊……是時候了。
你能……帶我到那裡去嗎……？
我們一定要擊敗那頭魔獸，保護露娜娜……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<select_end><close>

21274.en:
I appreciate it. I am truly indebted to you. My eyes are blurry, and at last I can't do anything without
someone's help.
21274.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「ありがたい。本当に　恩に着る……。
　目がかすみ……　いよいよ　誰かの手を借りねば
　何も　できぬようになってしまった……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21274.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 고맙네, 이 은혜는 잊지 않겠네…….
　이제 눈도 침침해져…… 누군가의 도움 없이는
　아무것도 할 수 없게 되었어…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21274.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>感激不尽，真的很感谢你……
我的眼睛已经看不清楚……
现在做什么事都必须依靠其他人……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21274.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>感激不盡，真的很感謝你……
我的眼睛已經看不清楚……
現在做什麼事都必須依靠其他人……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21275.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>But as long as I get that staff back,
I can fight Byblos. Until then, I will
follow you desperately.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21275.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「だが　あの杖さえ　取り戻せば……
　わしも　ビュブロスと戦える……。
　それまでは　おぬしに　必死で…ついていく。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21275.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 하지만 내 지팡이만 되찾으면……
　나도 비블로스와 싸울 수 있네…….
　그때까진 열심히… 자네를 뒤따라가겠네.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21275.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>不过，要是能拿回那把手杖……
我也能和朱拜勒斯战斗……
在那之前，我会拼命……跟着你。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21275.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>不過，要是能拿回那把法杖……
我也能和朱拜勒斯戰鬥……
在那之前，我會拚命……跟在你後面。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21277.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>I'm glad you're willing to do it. You
seem to have a lot of other people's
requests.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21277.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「引き受けてくれるのは　ありがたいが……。
　おぬしは……　他の者の依頼が
　たまっているようだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21277.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 부탁을 들어주는 건 고맙네만…….
　지금은…… 다른 이들의
　의뢰가 밀려 있는 것 같군…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21277.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>谢谢你愿意接受我的委托……
但是……你似乎
已经有很多委托在身了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21277.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>謝謝你願意接受我的委託……
但是……你似乎
已經有很多委託在身了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21278.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>It can't be helped. I'll be here for a
while, so you go ahead and take care
of that first.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21278.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「仕方あるまい……。
　わしは　しばらく　ここにいるから
　先に　そちらを片付けてくるがよい……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21278.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 하는 수 없지…….
　난 여기서 기다릴 테니
　먼저 다른 의뢰를 처리하고 오게나…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21278.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>没办法了……
我会在这里等你，
你先去把那些任务处理完再来吧……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21278.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>沒辦法了……
我會在這裡等你，
你先去把那些任務處理完再來吧……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21279.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>I see. But, alas, I cannot do anything
on my own now. You are my only hope.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21279.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「そうか……。だが　情けないことに
　今のわしは　ひとりでは　何もできん……。
　おぬしだけが　頼りなのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21279.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 그렇군……. 하지만 한심하게도 지금의 난
　혼자서는 아무것도 할 수가 없어…….
　자네만이 유일한 희망일세…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21279.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>这样啊……不过说来丢人，
现在我一个人什么都做不了……
我只能仰仗你了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21279.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>這樣啊……不過說來丟人，
現在我一個人什麼都做不了……
我只能仰仗你了……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21280.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Please, <pc>. If you change
your mind, please come back. I must
protect Lunana!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21280.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ……　頼む……。
　気が変わったら　また来てくれんか……。
　わしは　ルナナを守らねばならんのだ……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21280.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: <pc>…… 부탁일세…….
　마음이 바뀌면 다시 와 주지 않겠나……?
　난 반드시 루나나를 지켜야 하네……!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21280.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>啊……拜托你了……
要是你改变主意，再过来找我吧……
我非保护露娜娜不可……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21280.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>啊……拜託你了……
要是你改變主意，再過來找我吧……
我非保護露娜娜不可……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21276.en:
Please, we are asking you. We will break the chain of unfortunate destinies of Holta and
Lunana!
21276.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「<pc>……　頼んだぞ……。
　ホルタとルナナ　ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は
　わしらの手で　断ち切るのだ……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21276.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: <pc>…… 잘 부탁하겠네…….
　홀터와 루나나, 두 사람의 불행한
　운명의 연쇄를 우리 손으로 끊는 걸세……!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21276.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>……拜托你了……
霍尔达和露娜娜他们两人不幸的命运枷锁，
就由我们来斩断……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21276.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>……拜託你了……
霍爾達和露娜娜他們兩人不幸的命運枷鎖，
就由我們來斬斷……！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21285.en:
After taking my staff, Lunana followed the last Magical Beast Byblos to the Cave of Zaag at the southern end of
the Zagban Hills.
21285.ja:
